text: The 1886 California Golden Bears football team was an American football team that represented the University of California, Berkeley during the 1886 college football season. The team was the first team to represent the University. The team competed as an independent under head coach Oscar S. Howard and compiled a record of 6–2–1. ==Schedule== ==References== California Category:California Golden Bears football seasons California Football
title: 1886 California Golden Bears football team
